oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Surgery at Oak Ridge Hospital
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three men and three women wearing surgical masks are gathered around an unseen surgical patient.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hospitals; Nurses; Oak Ridge Hospital (Oak Ridge, Tenn.); Physicians; Surgery
Burks, Annie; Clark, Dwight; Kallestead, Leonard; Rea, Charles
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oak Ridge Journal article on November 16, 1944 with a similar image. From that image, it appears that Dr. Clark is second from left; Dr. Kallestead is third from left; Annie Burks is on right and Dr. Rea is second from right. Two other nurses are unidentified.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
